did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.unittitle: American Baptist Foreign Mission Society Records, 1813-1961
did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Missionary correspondence (1817-1900) and geographic files relating to activities of the American Baptist Foreign Mission Society in Burma.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: Missionary correspondence (1817-1900) and geographic files relating to activities of the American Baptist Foreign Mission Society in Burma.

userestrict.head: Restrictions on Use:
userestrict.p: Reproductions are not provided from this collection. Please contact the American Baptist Historical Society, 3001 Mercer University Drive, Atlanta, GA 30341, or abhs@abhsarchives.org
For permission to publish, contact: American Baptist Historical Society, 3001 Mercer University Drive, Atlanta, GA 30341.

altformavail.head: Available Copies:
altformavail.p: Originals at American Baptist Historical Society, 3001 Mercer University Drive, Atlanta, GA 30341.

prefercite.head: Cite As:
prefercite.p: American Baptist Foreign Mission Society records, #4424. Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library.
